00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';

00032 // page title
00033 $page_title = 'Authority List';
00034 // get id from url
00035 $biblioID = 0;
00036 if (isset($_GET['biblioID']) AND !empty($_GET['biblioID'])) {
00037     $biblioID = (integer)$_GET['biblioID'];
00038 }
00039 
00040 // start the output buffer
00041 ob_start();
00042 // iframe blocker
00043 if (isset($_GET['block'])) {
00044     echo '<div id="blocker" style="position: fixed; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: #CCCCCC; opacity: 0.3;">&nbsp;</div>';

00047 <script type="text/javascript">
00048 function confirmProcess(int_biblio_id, int_item_id)
00049 {
00050     var confirmBox = confirm('Are you sure to remove selected author?' + "\n" + 'Once deleted, it can\'t be restored!');
00051     if (confirmBox) {
00052         // set hidden element value
00053         document.hiddenActionForm.bid.value = int_biblio_id;
00054         document.hiddenActionForm.remove.value = int_item_id;
00055         // submit form
00056         document.hiddenActionForm.submit();
00057     }
00058 }
00059 </script>
00060 <?php
00061 /* main content */
00062 // author of removal
00063 if (isset($_GET['removesess'])) {
00064     $idx = $_GET['removesess'];
00065     unset($_SESSION['biblioAuthor'][$idx]);
00066     echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00067     echo 'alert(\''.__('Author succesfully removed!').'\');';
00068     echo 'location.href = \'iframe_author.php\';';
00069     echo '</script>';
00070 }
00071 
00072 if (isset($_POST['remove'])) {
00073     $id = (integer)$_POST['remove'];
00074     $bid = (integer)$_POST['bid'];
00075     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00076     $sql_op->delete('biblio_author', 'author_id='.$id.' AND biblio_id='.$bid);
00077     echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00078     echo 'alert(\''.__('Author removed!').'\');';
00079     echo 'location.href = \'iframe_author.php?biblioID='.$bid.'\';';
00080     echo '</script>';
00081 }
00082 
00083 // if biblio ID is set
00084 if ($biblioID) {
00085     $table = new simbio_table();
00086     $table->table_attr = 'align="center" style="width: 100%;" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0"';
00087 
00088     // database list
00089     $biblio_author_q = $dbs->query("SELECT ba.*, a.author_name FROM biblio_author AS ba
00090         LEFT JOIN mst_author AS a ON ba.author_id=a.author_id
00091         WHERE ba.biblio_id=$biblioID ORDER BY level ASC");
00092 
00093     $row = 1;
00094     while ($biblio_author_d = $biblio_author_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00095         // alternate the row color
00096         $row_class = ($row%2 == 0)?'alterCell':'alterCell2';
00097 
00098         // remove link
00099         $remove_link = '<a href="#" onclick="confirmProcess('.$biblioID.', '.$biblio_author_d['author_id'].')"
00100             style="color: #FF0000; text-decoration: underline;">Delete</a>';
00101         $author = $biblio_author_d['author_name'];
00102 
00103         $table->appendTableRow(array($remove_link, $author, $sysconf['authority_level'][$biblio_author_d['level']]));
00104         $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold; width: 10%;"');
00105         $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold; width: 70%;"');
00106         $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="width: 20%;"');
00107         $row++;
00108     }
00109 
00110     echo $table->printTable();
00111     // hidden form
00112     echo '<form name="hiddenActionForm" method="post" action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'"><input type="hidden" name="bid" value="0" /><input type="hidden" name="remove" value="0" /></form>';
00113 } else {
00114     if ($_SESSION['biblioAuthor']) {
00115         $table = new simbio_table();
00116         $table->table_attr = 'align="center" style="width: 100%;" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0"';
00117 
00118         $row = 1;
00119         $row_class = 'alterCell2';
00120         foreach ($_SESSION['biblioAuthor'] as $biblio_session) {
00121             // remove link
00122             $remove_link = '<a href="iframe_author.php?removesess='.$biblio_session[0].'"
00123                 style="color: #000000; text-decoration: underline;">Remove</a>';
00124 
00125             if ($biblio_session) {
00126                 $author_q = $dbs->query("SELECT author_name FROM mst_author
00127                     WHERE author_id=".$biblio_session[0]);
00128                 $author_d = $author_q->fetch_row();
00129                 $author = $author_d[0];
00130             }
00131 
00132             $table->appendTableRow(array($remove_link, $author, $sysconf['authority_level'][$biblio_session[1]]));
00133             $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="font-weight: bold; background-color: #ffc466; width: 10%;"');
00134             $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="background-color: #ffc466; width: 70%;"');
00135             $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'valign="top" class="'.$row_class.'" style="background-color: #ffc466; width: 20%;"');
00136 
00137             $row++;
00138         }
00139 
00140         echo $table->printTable();
00141     }
00142 }
00143 /* main content end */
00144 $content = ob_get_clean();
00145 // include the page template
00146 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'/admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/notemplate_page_tpl.php';
00147 ?>
